message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I believe a starting price of $1,600,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $1,500,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I value your interest, $1,500,000 falls short of my expectations for this product.  Would you consider $1,550,000?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am still unable to meet the price. I would like to propose $1,450,000 as a counteroffer.
Bob, I'm trying to find a middle ground here.  How about we settle at $1,500,000 even? This would be my final offer.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I am willing to go up to $1,475,000.
